hero.title: Full stack web Developer
hero.description: Hamza is a skilled full stack web developer from Morocco, specializing in creating dynamic and responsive web applications. With expertise in both frontend and backend development, he crafts dynamic and user-friendly digital experiences. Hamza is passionate about leveraging the latest technologies to build innovative solutions that meet client needs and exceed expectations.

projects.projectOverviewDescription: This project showcases modern web development practices and demonstrates proficiency in {{technologies}}. The application features a responsive design, clean user interface, and robust functionality that provides an excellent user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know more about my journey, skills, and passion for web development.
about.storyDescription: I am committed to excellence and driven by innovation, making me a valuable asset to any project. My goal is to create digital solutions that not only meet but exceed client expectations.

fullStackDeveloper.title: Full Stack Developer
fullStackDeveloper.description: Developing web applications using React, Laravel, and Node.js. Working with clients to create custom solutions for their business needs.

frontendDeveloper.title: Frontend Developer
frontendDeveloper.description: Built responsive web interfaces using React and modern CSS frameworks. Collaborated with design teams to implement pixel-perfect designs.
